findings.title: Improper Funding Source in Locker::_deposit_()
findings.description: The `_deposit_()` function uses an improper funding source to transfer assets for locking, potentially allowing abuse to lock `veOLIVE` tokens from users without their notice.

findings.title: Proper Pool/Manager Initialization in Pool/Manager::initialize()
findings.description: The initialization routine from the inherited ReentrancyGuard is not invoked in the initialize() helper routine of the Pool and Manager contracts.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: Inherent trust on privileged accounts (admin) with critical roles in governing and regulating system-wide operations, configuring settings, and controlling asset flow within protocol contracts.

findings.title: Accommodation of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The `approve()` routine may not work correctly with non-ERC20-compliant tokens due to idiosyncrasies from current widely-used token contracts.
